snippet.title: Restricted Area International Trailer
snippet.description: The Trailer of the game "Restricted Area". It is an action RPG with an accent on both action and RPG. On one hand, we want to bring you more action -this means the game plays faster, the controls are more direct, and you can even find some shooter elements.
